title: Golden Kalasam Pendant with Sparkling CZ Stones - Auspicious Mangalsutra Design
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones. Features a flawless Hyderabadi Polish for enduring radiance.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the traditional Kalasam motif, revered as a symbol of prosperity and new beginnings. The intricate filigree design is adorned with sparkling CZ stones, creating a harmonious blend of tradition and modern elegance. The Kalasam is delicately engraved with a Swastika symbol. Finished with a traditional gold ball dangling at the bottom to complete the design. Suitable to make any chain/mangalsutra look elegant.
colors: Predominantly gold with the brilliant white sparkle of the CZ stones.
occasions: or any auspicious occasion. This pendant adds a touch of sacred elegance to any ensemble and makes for a thoughtful gift.
description: This pendant is a timeless piece that blends traditional symbolism with contemporary design. The high-quality materials and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting brilliance, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. It holds cultural significance as a representation of prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful and cherished piece.
